text: Southport F.C. is an English football club from Southport, Merseyside. Southport F.C. was founded in 1881. Nowadays, the football club appear in Conference National. In the 2009-2010 season, the club won Conference Northern. In the 2010-2011 season, the club finished in 21st place and had to leave the league, but remained thanks to Rushden & Diamonds disbanding. == Source == * Official website Category:English football clubs Category:1881 establishments in England Category:Southport
title: Southport F.C.
